array $currentGlobalElement
Used by processElement to record the global element that is being processed.

This is to allow recursive ref ids to locate the global parent before the global parent has finished being processed.

string
array $namespacePrefixMap = array()
A map of the namespaces used to their 'correct' prefix where 'correct' is the one defined by the the original schema. For example, the standard prefix for the Xml Schema Instance (with prefix 'xsi' for namespace http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance) can be anything else in a user defined schema.
Default valuearray()Details
Type
array
string $ncName
static
Pattern for the whole of a name

get_schema_root(string $file) : string
static

Used by resolve_path to obtain the root element of a uri or file path.

This is necessary because a schema or linkbase uri may be absolute but without a host.

resolve_path(string $source, string $target) : string
static

Used to compute an absolute path for a resource ($target) with respect to a source.

For example, the presentation linkbase file will be specified as relative to the location of the host schema.
